body_content.explanation: able to be attacked or entered:
examples: Many of these borders have historically been porous and pregnable.
The documentary featured a team of ex-prisoners attempting to break into this thoroughly pregnable building.

body_content.explanation: easy to beat, especially in sport:
examples: The injury leaves the team with just one defensive midfielder to protect a dangerously pregnable defence.
They had five wins, alongside two narrow defeats in the barely pregnable strongholds of Limerick and Paris.
